Descendants.Name: Blitzjager
Descendants.Trait: After I move for the first time each turn, I may make a second move at -1 FORCE/SYNC.

Descendants.Name: Versteckter Soldat
Descendants.Trait: Stealth (I'm unblockable except by descendants with greater VECTOR).

Descendants.Name: Artillerietrooper
Descendants.Trait:
Slow,
Tap: Deal 1 damage to an adjacent holding.

Descendants.Name: Geistpaher
Descendants.Trait:
Nervous System Domination (I may make PSYCHE attacks. Find the difference between my PSYCHE and my target's below:
1: Target doesn't attack this combat
2: I choose how the target attacks this combat
3: I gain control of the target until the end of your next turn.

Descendants.Name: Gravitengenior
Descendants.Trait: When I attack, change my battlefield's gravity.

Descendants.Name: Marsfeldherr
Descendants.Trait: When I attack, your other descendants get +1 FORCE and +1 SYNC.

Descendants.Name: Marsdominus
Descendants.Trait: Slow, Prevent all sources of 1 damage. Protector (enemy units must attack this unit in combat.)

Descendants.Name: Kommandant Wolfgang
Descendants.Trait: When I gain control of a holding, you  may sacrifice all souls there to gain that much materia plus two.

Descendants.Name: Frau Doktor Elisa Reinhart
Descendants.Trait: Tap, sacrifice three population: Create a Lurking Horror descendant with "Force 2, Psyche 1, Vector 0, Sync 2", and "may not be blocked by more than one descendant." Activate this ability only if I'm at a non-martian holding.

Descendants.Name: Frau Doktor Volkova
Descendants.Trait: When I take control of an enemy holding, you may sacrifice one soul. If you do, each adjacent holding controlled by the enemy player loses one soul. (Genetically-engineered virus)

Vessels.Name: Firebreather
Vessels.Effect:
Orbital, 
Bombard X (Damage to population is 1/2 FORCE, rounded up). 
Range: 2, 
Crew 3: +1 VECTOR/SYNC or +1 FORCE. 
Friendly descendants on the surface get +1 FORCE/SYNC. 
Vessel (vessels cannot claim holdings or attack populations.)

Vessels.Name: Palace of Heaven
Vessels.Effect: At the end of your turn, draw two cards.

Vessels.Name: Luftkampfer
Vessels.Effect:
Range: 2 (This ship may move twice, but attack once.)
Crew 1: +1 Force or +1 SYNC.
Vessel (vessels cannot claim holdings or attack populations.)

Vessels.Name: Red Ascension Array
Vessels.Effect:
Req. Souls: 4
Mass Destruction (This vessel can target holdings. When it deals damage to a holding, destroy it and all descendants, works, and population there.)

Vessels.Name: Tsiolkovsky's Bane
Vessels.Effect: Slaver (if this ship would extinguish a soul, migrate that soul to a holding of your choice instead).

Vessels.Name: ECM Stealth Ship
Vessels.Effect:
Orbital
Range: 2
Stealth,
Crew 1: +1 targets for Hijack Coordinates.
Hijack Coordinates: Change the target of target descendant's ability or attack (it can't attack itself). 
Vessel (vessels cannot claim holdings or attack populations.)

Fates.Name: Hunter-killer Missile
Fates.Effect: Deal two damage to one target

Fates.Name: Beseech the Great Ones
Fates.Effect: Return a vessel or descendant from the past to play.

Fates.Name: Panic
Fates.Effect: The next time target enemy descendant or vessel is dealt damage this turn, it is destroyed.

Fates.Name: Expedition
Fates.Effect: Move a descendant you control to an uncontrolled holding.

Fates.Name: Gain Ground
Fates.Effect: Target descendant can move again this round.

Fates.Name: Armageddon
Fates.Effect: Deal 5 FORCE damage to all descendants and vessels.

Fates.Name: Pillaging
Fates.Effect: Draw a card for every soul your descendants extinguished in combat this turn.

Fates.Name: Outmaneuver
Fates.Effect: Target descendant or vessel gets +1 FORCE or +1 SYNC.

Works.Name: Materia Mine
Works.Effect: Add one materia for every 3 souls on this holding.

Works.Name: Data Nexus
Works.Effect: Increase Data production on this holding by 1 for every 2 souls.

Works.Name: Anima Condenser
Works.Effect: Increase Anima production on this holding by 1 for every 2 souls.

Works.Name: Resource Amplifier
Works.Effect: Choose an element and double this holding's production of it.

Works.Name: Defense Grid
Works.Effect: This holding and adjacent ones get +1 Garrison.

Works.Name: Cloning Tower
Works.Effect: At the start of the round, choose a descendant at this holding and turn it into a copy of another descendant you control.

Works.Name: Advanced R&D Center
Works.Effect: At the start of your next turn, all descendants you control gain Phase Dispersion Rifles. They can attack an opponent's PSYCHE with FORCE.

Works.Name: Teleportation Station
Works.Effect: Tap: Move a descendant at this holding to an adjacent one.

Works.Name: Hyperspace Conduit
Works.Effect: Tap: Target vessel you control at this holding has 3 range until end of round.

Works.Name: Reproduction World
Works.Effect: When you may populate this holding an additional time each round.

Works.Name: Observatory
Works.Effect: Draw a card at the start of the round.

Works.Name: Megafactory
Works.Effect: Tap: Draw a card for every three souls on this holding.

Works.Name: Colony Ship
Works.Effect: Tap: Add one soul to an uncontrolled holding and gain control of it, then move this work there.

Works.Name: Human Recomposition Zone
Works.Effect:
Tap, sacrifice all the souls on this holding: draw that many cards.
Build this work only on a non-martian holding.

Works.Name: Mobile Headquarters
Works.Effect:
Tap: units that attack from or defend this holding this turn get +1 FORCE/SYNC.
2m: Move the mobile HQ to a holding you control.

Works.Name: Neue Berlin Institute of Genomics
Works.Effect: Tap, sacrifice a descendant: search your deck for a descendant and put them into play. They gain "slow".

Holdings.Name: The Berlin Anomaly
Holdings.Effect: Units deployed here lose slow.

Holdings.Name: Sanctuary Zone Alpha
Holdings.Effect: You may populate this holding an additional time each round.

Holdings.Name: CEC-Prime
Holdings.Effect: Tap, sacrifice two souls: Draw a card.

Holdings.Name: Project BLACKLIGHT Facility
Holdings.Effect: At the start of the round, up to one unit stationed here becomes unblockable until end of round.

Holdings.Name: Free Earth Confederation Territory
Holdings.Effect: When you populate this holding, populate each adjacent holding.

Holdings.Name: Kaufmann-Engel Manifestation Zone
Holdings.Effect: Descendants can't move here unless their controller pays 1 for each descendant.

Holdings.Name: Himmelsburg Orbital Habitat
Holdings.Effect: Units attacking from or defending this location get +1 FORCE.

Holdings.Name: Europa Deep Drilling Station
Holdings.Effect: When you move to this holding, you may make a free move to an adjacent holding with -1 SYNC.

Holdings.Name: The Kuiper Belt Array
Holdings.Effect: At the start of the round, you may play a Fate card from the past. If you do, exile it as it resolves.

Holdings.Name: The Lazarite Planetoid
Holdings.Effect: Tap: Draw a card, then discard a card.

Holdings.Name: Mondreich
Holdings.Effect: At the start of the round, choose a descendant here and give it a +1 counter to any attribute.

Holdings.Name: OLYMPUS Lunar Facility
Holdings.Effect: When one of your descendants attacks from this holding, your descendants on adjacent holdings may join the attack.

Holdings.Name: Hydrogen Refueling Station Alpha
Holdings.Effect: When a vessel moves here, you may refresh its move action(s).

Holdings.Name: Neue Berlin
Holdings.Effect: Tap: Draw a card if this holding has eight or more souls.

Holdings.Name: Phobos Command
Holdings.Effect: Units here get +1 FORCE when attacking or defending a Martian holding.

Holdings.Name: Red Legion Training Complex
Holdings.Effect: Units deployed here gain "+1 FORCE in low-g environments".

Holdings.Name: Valles Marineris Deep Sanctuary
Holdings.Effect: Tap: Move target descendant here to another Martian holding.

Holdings.Name: Olympus Mons Disruption Zone
Holdings.Effect: Fates cannot be targeted here unless their controller pays an additional 2m. Vessels attacking from here gain Stealth until end of turn.

Holdings.Name: Ares Fabrication Complex
Holdings.Effect: Works and Descendants cost 1 less to deploy here.

Holdings.Name: Mercury Solar Arrays
Holdings.Effect: Each population here adds two materia.

Holdings.Name: New Plymouth
Holdings.Effect: You may pay 2 and discard a Fate card to gain control of an opponent's Fate card. You may choose new targets for it.

Holdings.Name: Secret Base
Holdings.Effect: Units that leave this holding gain Stealth until the end of the round.

Holdings.Name: Thule Collective Meditation Hub
Holdings.Effect: Units that attack from here get +1 PSYCHE and gain Nervous Center Domination until end of combat.

Holdings.Name: Ceres Diplomatic Station
Holdings.Effect: Tap (subwarp): Move a descendant you control to this holding.

Holdings.Name: Crimson Hollow
Holdings.Effect:
Costs 8m to explore. 

When a descendant first enters this holding, create Tsiolkovsky's Bane and gain control of it.
Holdings: “Once hidden in the outer debris of a collapsed moon, Crimson Hollow was the secret fortress of Admiral Varkas Korr, the most feared pirate of the Lost Cycle. Said to be carved from the husk of a slain celestial beast, the asteroid holds the wreckage of hundreds of raided ships—and, buried deep within, the intact bridge of Korr’s mythic vessel, Tsiolkovsky's Bane, a heavily-modified Firebreather.”

Holdings.Name: The Venus Quarantine Zone
Holdings.Effect: When a descendant enters this holding, it gains "Venusian." Your opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one for each Venusian descendant you control.
